content: each front paw round 1 6sc dar 6 fasten_off leaving tail long for sewing sew each pad on to the flat sides of paw facing the body forming the shape of a paw print use the ribbon and tie a bow around dawson s neck use thread of a similar color and make small stitches through the knot of the bow to prevent it from being able to come undone i also like to stitch it to the bear with these stitches so the bow cannot slide around the neck
